result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel W. Wildman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Daniel W. Wildman is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Daniel W. Wildman was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Payment plan $25/mo starting on or before 06/01/2022

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
01:29 PM DA calls case and states appearances. Defendant Daniel W. Wildman appeared with attorney Christin Marie Saint Pierre who appeaared via zoom.  Karl J. Kelz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DA Kelz states an agreemnet has been reached and recites the agreement on record. Contingent upon the defendant's plea the Ct. 1 the State will move to Dismiss Ct. 2. Attorney Saqint Pierre makes statements. Defendant enters plea of NO CONTEST to Ct. 1 therefore Ct. 2 is DISMISSED. Court questions DE regarding the plea. DA explains elements of charge.  Court finds plea/waiver to be free, etc.  Court finds factual basis does exist.  Court accepts plea, finds DE guilty and orders entry of JOC. Comments by parties.
Court Imposes:
$300 Fine 
$200 DNA + Sample 

Payment plan Granted: $25/mo. Starting on or before 06/01/2022 until paid in full or 1 day in jail for every $25 not paid. 

Appeal Rights Given
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel W. Wildman
Current: W6297 Old 8 Road West, Prentice, WI 54556 United States  (Effective: 03-01-2022)
Prior: W5883 Larkin Rd, Prentice, WI 54556

If not already completed DE must submit to booking at Sheriff's Dept prior to release.
Defendant shall give written notice prior to any change in address or telephone number to the Clerk of this Court and Defense Attorney.

10:03 AM Defendant Daniel W. Wildman appeared with attorney Christin Marie Saint Pierre via telephone.  Karl J. Kelz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Saint Pierre requests an adjournment as she has not been able to go over the criminal complaint with her client. This matter is in recess until 10:20 Am. Back on the record at 10:28 AM appearances are as previously stated.   Complaint acknowledged, reading waived.  DE enters plea of NOT GUILTY to all counts. Da Kelz makes bond recommendations. Bond set and ordered as requested  Court orders Pre-trial conference be scheduled.

10:27 AM Defendant Daniel W. Wildman appeared in court. Karl J. Kelz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant shows paperwork that states his initial appearance for today however the SPD Attorney that was appointed had motioned for continuance due to schedule conflicts. Court advises defendant to contact his Attorney.
Initial appearance on March 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
nd notice of intent to use DNA
